ISSUE.TITLE: podman machine can be created with arbitrary big memory
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description Due to a typo on my end, I created a podman machine with way more memory than available on my machine. The creation was fine and both podman and podman-desktop report ... ~268GB of Memory... (my system "only" has 128GB). ``` podman machine inspect | jq '.[0].Resources' { "CPUs": 4, "DiskSize": 100, "Memory": 256000 } ``` ### Steps to reproduce the issue ``` podman machine init --cpus=4 --memory=256000 ``` ^^^ this is where I made a typo, I intended `25600` and not `256000` ### Describe the results you received ``` podman machine start Starting machine "podman-machine-default" Waiting for VM ... Mounting volume... /private/tmp:/private/tmp Error: exit status 255 ``` ### Describe the results you expected An error/warning. ### podman info output ```yaml host: arch: amd64 buildahVersion: 1.29.0 cgroupControllers: -
